mapper.select: select * from freeBbs where title REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) or content REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) order by wdate desc
select * from partyBbs where title REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) or content REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) order by wdate desc
mapper.update: update freeBbs set del = 2 where bbsSeq=#{bbsSeq}
update freeBbs set del = 0 where bbsSeq=#{bbsSeq}
update partyBbs set del = 2 where partySeq=#{partySeq}
update partyBbs set del = 0 where partySeq=#{partySeq}
update member set auth=#{auth} where memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
mapper.select: select * from (SELECT substr(wdate,1,10) as wdate, count(substr(wdate,1,10)) as count FROM partyBbs group by substr(wdate,1,10) ORDER BY wdate desc limit 7) a order by wdate asc
select * from freeReply where content REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) order by wdate desc;
select * from partyReply where content REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(word SEPARATOR "|") from spamword) order by wdate desc;
select * from partyReply where replySeq=#{replySeq} order by wdate limit #{start},#{limit};
mapper.update: update freeReply set del=#{del} where seq=#{seq} and replySeq=#{replySeq}
update partyReply set del=#{del} where seq=#{seq} and replySeq=#{replySeq}
